front.title: Application of the MIPv6 protocol to the multi-homing problem

abstract.t: This note attempts to describe how to apply the MIPv6 protocol toprovide fault tolerance to transport layer connections establishedbetween a multi-homed host and other hosts in the Internet.Specifically, this note addresses the usage of MIPv6 signalingmessages to convey information about alternative address to be usedwhen an outage occurs. Additionally, possible mechanisms to detectfailures affecting the currently used path are explored.
